dr.evolution.tree
Interface MutableTree

All Superinterfaces:
Attributable, Identifiable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>, MutableTaxonList, java.io.Serializable, TaxonList, Tree, Units
All Known Implementing Classes:
ARGModel, ClusteringTree, EmpiricalTreeDistributionModel, FlexibleTree, LeastSquaresClockTree, MulSpeciesTreeModel, NeighborJoiningTree, PopTreeModel, RateSmoothingTree, SimpleTree, SpeciesTreeModel, StarTreeModel, TransformedTreeModel, TreeModel, UPGMATree
public interface MutableTree
extends Tree, MutableTaxonList

Interface for a phylogenetic or genealogical tree.
